Working with a Raven WPS server¶

In this example we’ll connect to a Raven WPS server to run an hydrological model and compute some objective functions on the simulated flows.

[1]:

# Local server
url = "http://localhost:9099/wps"

# Remote server (TODO)

[3]:

from birdy import WPSClient
wps = WPSClient(url)
wps?

[ ]:

# Create or access an input time series file

[ ]:

# wps.raven_hmets(ts, params=..., start_date=..., end_date=..., name=)
